ygData.subject: Newbie on list - finally found a Bard list with some lfe to it!
ygData.msgSnippet: Hope this isn t too boring or long, but I haven t been a fast leveler (~50 days played at 51rst lvl) nor a big time quester/raider (kids and real job ... hear
ygData.messageBody:
Hope this isn't too boring or long, but I haven't been a fast leveler (~50
days played at 51rst lvl) nor a big time quester/raider (kids and real job
:-). So at 51 I'm pretty under equipped, esp. for 1hs. I would love to
hear suggestions on how to improve my equip with the understanding I can't
do 8 hour camps and I only have a few thousand in the bank:

Head: Lambent
Face: Mask of Deciever
Neck: 5 AC + stats choker (or CHA jewelry)
Chest: Sentry BP
Arms: SS
Wrists: Lambent (or CHA jewelry)
Hands: SS
Waist: Hangman's Noose
Legs: Lambent
Feet: SS

Primary: Journeyman Walking Stick
Secondary: Springwood Club/Blade of Fiery Lamenations
Range: Dirk

Instruments: MM Drums (finishing tambourine now), Gypsy Lute, Minotaur
Horn

Btw, I'm done trying for the Harmony dagger in KC. No one I've talked to
has seen one drop in a long time on Xegony.

Thanks for your input,

Tzeetch
51st Ministrel
Xegony Server
